subject: Loan request approved
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE ready money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this tender will expire THIS NIGHT):
$449,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest entire payment!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill out this easy form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!!
http://ekwskuplore.com/
